description:
Avoiding chills is crucial when travelling in the cold. These double layered base layer bottoms hold in little one's body heat and moves any sweat to the outside layer where can evaporate without cooling them down.

  • Polyester and merino blend has Accu-Dri® wicking technology to keep you dry and warm
  • Merino wool is naturally antimicrobial
  • Elastic waistband holds them comfortably in place
  • Flatlock seams throughout for chafe-free wear
name: Kombi Merino Mix Pro Long Bottoms - Children to Youths
